name: Alexandra Smith
description: Alexandra brings a wealth of experience and passion for luxury hospitality to her role as a senior resort specialist. With a focus on the Caribbean and Mexico's Riviera, she excels in matching discerning clients with their dream beachfront resorts and luxurious getaways.

name: Michael Nguyen
description: Michael specializes in curating unforgettable vacation rental experiences in some of the world's most exotic destinations. With an eye for luxury and a dedication to personalized service, he helps clients discover their perfect island retreats and oceanfront villas.

name: Sophie Johnson
description: Sophie's love for nature and hospitality shines through in her role as a mountain lodge advisor. Specializing in alpine chalets and ski resorts, she helps clients find their ideal mountain retreats, whether it's for skiing adventures or peaceful nature getaways.

name: David Thompson
description: David is a seasoned professional in the luxury hospitality industry, with a focus on advising clients on prestigious hotels and resorts worldwide. From elegant five-star hotels to charming boutique properties, David's expertise ensures exceptional experiences for discerning travelers.

name: Amanda Lee
description: Amanda's passion for coastal living shines through in her role as a beachfront property specialist. With expertise in oceanfront estates and seaside villas, she helps clients find their perfect coastal retreats along the picturesque California coast and the idyllic Greek Islands.
